name: Quantum Pixel Assassins
description:
In the year of 0x9C8 the great war between the leaders of Earth has raged for centuries. The horrible tyrants Adolf Pixler, Beniti Pixelini and Kim Jonp-xil has sacrificed peta-bytes of innocent pixels in their fight for world domination.

As the Quantum Pixel Assassins, a special pair of soldiers with their coloration quantum entangled, it is your job to kill off these tyrants in this puzzle stealth game to save the world! Hopefully...

Made during Spring Game Jam 2017, organized by LiU Game Jam, based on the theme Pixels Eraser.

Playing instructions

You are invisible to enemies and cameras when your color matches the floor beneath you but remember... when your color changes, so does your partner's.

You finish a level, both of you need to reach the target and erase it from existent but pulling the trigger simultaneously. (Actually, you just need to hold it down simultaneously.)

Keyboard bindings

To main menu | Esc
Menu: Accept | Enter or Esc
Menu: Back | Backspace or Esc

Player 1

Move | W, A, S, D
Turn green | Left Shift
Turn red | Left Ctrl
Interact/Erase | Space

Player 2

Move | Arrow Keys
Turn green | Right Shift
Turn red | Right Ctrl
Interact/Erase | Enter

Xbox 360 controller bindings

To main menu | Start
Menu: Accept | A
Menu: Back | B

Move | Left Thumb Stick or D-pad
Turn green | A
Turn red | B
Interact/Erase | Right Trigger or Right Bumper
